Shivah::

"Other Pest" thought Shivah when he received the message a last the 
male said "What do you whant to speak about Azure BLade?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> AzureBlade arrived near the BlackFortress when he felt the spark 
> getting tainted.
> 
> AzureBlade: By Prime... this bot must have been reprogrammed... 
No!!!
> 
> He opened a channel with the Black Fortress. He knew they would not 
> listen to a maximal because he felt them to be predacons. He would 
> have to outwit them.
> 
> AzureBlade:
> Transformers occupying the base known as the Black Fortress, I am 
> AzureBlade. I demand that you let me negotiate with you about a 
> renegade who just arrived on planet.
